required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Reliability and Cross-cultural Adaptation of the Turkish Version of the Neuropathic Pain Symptom Inventory
clinical_study.official_title: Reliability and Cross-cultural Adaptation of the Turkish Version of the Neuropathic Pain Symptom Inventory

lead_sponsor.agency: Erenköy Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Hospital

clinical_study.source: Erenköy Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: In this study, investigators want to perform the reliability and cross-cultural Adaptation of the Turkish Version of the Neuropathic Pain Symptom Inventory

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of the study is to determine the Turkish version, the reliability and cross-cultural Adaptation of the Turkish Version of the Neuropathic Pain Symptom Inventory. 120 patients with neuropathic pain will be included in the study. Test-retest and internal consistency analysis were conducted to determine the reliability of the questionnaire. Test-retest results evaluated using the Intraclass Correlation Coefficient method.

primary_outcome.description: Investigators will use linguistic validaiton guideline of Mapi research.
DN4 has become one of the principal condition-specific outcome measures of neuropathic pain.Investigators will use it for comparing results of NPSI.

intervention.description: Investigators will use the Neuropathic Pain Symptom Inventory for assessing neuropathic symptoms

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age upper 18
- Complaints of neuropathic pain for at least 3 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Presence of psychiatric illness
- Cancer pain, unsuccessful lumbar surgeon syndrome etc. mix type pain presence
- Presence of complex regional pain syndrome
- Cognitive impairment (mini-mental test score <24)
- Native language is not Turkish

overall_official.affiliation: ERENKOY PHYSICAL THERAPY AND REHABILITATION HOSPITAL

facility.name: Erenkoy Physical Treatment Nad Rehabilitation Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Erenköy Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Hospital
responsible_party.investigator_title: Medical doctor, specialist on physical therapy and rehabilitation
